pkgmetadata.longdescription: # GEOGloWS[![Conda Version](https://img.shields.io/conda/vn/conda-forge/geoglows.svg)](https://img.shields.io/conda/vn/conda-forge/geoglows.svg)[![Conda Downloads](https://img.shields.io/conda/dn/conda-forge/geoglows.svg)](https://anaconda.org/conda-forge/geoglows)[![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/geoglows)](https://pypi.org/project/geoglows)[Visit the Conda Forge page](https://github.com/conda-forge/geoglows-feedstock)```bashconda install -c conda-forge geoglows```Also available on pypi[Visit the PyPi page](https://pypi.org/project/geoglows)```bashpip install geoglows```Tools to access and process data coming from the GEOGloWS initiative.https://geoglows.readthedocs.ioThe sample data are from ReachID 13073600 which is on the mississippi river
